title: Startup Colorado Fund
description: To multiply connections among entrepreneurs and mentors, improve access to entrepreneurial education, and build a more vibrant entrepreneurial community.  Examples include programs such as Startup Summer, Startup High School and Startup Week.
marketingContent: To multiply connections among entrepreneurs and mentors, improve access to entrepreneurial education, and build a more vibrant entrepreneurial community. Examples include programs such as Startup Summer, Startup High School and Startup Week.
